title: Generate app &Â lib feature based on name and app

name.description: Name of the feature, such as "products" or "users"). Recommended to use the plural form of the name.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the feature? An example would be "users".

app.description: App name as definition of root
app.x-prompt: What is the name of app where this feature should be registered? An example would be "invoicing"
